about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for an intense and terrifying survival horror experience in Evil Officer for PC. You find yourself trapped in the house of Evil Officer who met a grim fate long ago. Unbeknownst to you, he seeks revenge from beyond the grave, and you are his next target! As you venture through the eerie halls of the haunted house, you must search for crucial items that unlock the numerous locks guarding your escape routes.



This chilling remake offers an array of heart-pounding encounters, as you must stealthily navigate the darkened corridors, evading the relentless pursuit of the vengeful Officer. Can you muster the courage to outwit this malevolent spirit and find a way to freedom, or will you succumb to the nightmarish consequences that lie ahead?

Interact with various objects scattered throughout the haunted abode, and devise a cunning strategy to elude your paranormal tormentor. But beware, the Officer possesses an uncanny sense of hearing, adding an extra layer of tension to your desperate escape.

Are you ready to face your darkest fears and confront the wrath of the "Evil Officer" in this spine-chilling PC remake? Your survival instincts will be put to the ultimate test as you embark on a harrowing journey filled with horror, suspense, and adrenaline-pumping action. Remember, time is ticking, and the malevolent Officer is on the hunt. Can you break the curse and emerge victorious, or will you become just another tragic chapter in this chilling tale of revenge? The choice is yours.

name: Evil Officer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti with 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated Performance: Runs at 1080/60fps on Low Settings. Minor lags might occur.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated Performance: 1080/60fps on Ultra settings. Minor lags might occur at intensive scenes.

short_description: Evil Officer is a mystery horror game where you are stuck in a Jail. Solve the puzzles to pave your way out. Stealth is the key to surviving this scary adventure. Multiple game modes to challenge you in different ways.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Hindi, Urdu, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
